tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE soil_monitoring_table (
    soil_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    soil_type VARCHAR(50),
    nutrient_level DECIMAL,
    pH_value DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE CropProduction (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(255),
    optimal_nutrient_level FLOAT,
    optimal_pH_value FLOAT,
    season VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE SoilSamples (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	sample_date DATE,
	nitrogen_level DECIMAL,
	ph_value DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Crops (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(255),
	type VARCHAR(50),
	nutrient_requirements VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE FieldLocations (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	location_name VARCHAR(255),
	latitude DECIMAL,
	longitude DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Soil_Nutrient_Levels (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    nutrient_name VARCHAR(50),
    nutrient_value FLOAT,
    measurement_unit VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE pH_Values (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    pH_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Crop_Production (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(50),
    expected_yield FLOAT,
    planting_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Soil_Sampling (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sampling_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    technician_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE SoilNutrientLevels (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  nutrient_name VARCHAR(50),
  nutrient_level FLOAT,
  measurement_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE SoilPHValues (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  pH_value FLOAT,
  measurement_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Crops (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(50),
  planting_date DATE,
  harvest_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE FieldLocations (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  field_name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  area_acres FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE CropNutrientRequirements (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_id INT,
  nutrient_name VARCHAR(50),
  required_level FLOAT
)
